item.title: [Unsolved]Client Problems![Unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“ultimatepkvillage, post:4, topic:535528”]dj8o8mz3vkrl205/MinescapeCache.rar

You uploaded your cache to dropbox as a raw file.

The cache is suppose to be a zipped file.

  1. Locate cache folder with the correct files

  2. Open cache folder

  3. Select All the cache files inside of the folder

  4. With all the files selected right click and choose add to archive… (Winrar)

  5. On archive type by default it is set at .rar change it to .zip

  6. Now re-upload cache to dropbox and then change the cache download link.

  7. Your link with start off with Https:// remove the s so it will look like Http://

In signlink.java

Replace

With

String HomeIsBaws = System.getProperty("C:/");[/quote]it worked as rar it was first c;/users/user/MinescapeCache/MinescapeCache

now it is Users User Minescapecache

uploaded to dropbox as .rar maybe il try to change it to just .zip all files are in there so cant be that it is downloading wrong will try it out to change it to zip

Read full topic

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

dj8o8mz3vkrl205/MinescapeCache.rar

You uploaded your cache to dropbox as a raw file.

The cache is suppose to be a zipped file.

  1. Locate cache folder with the correct files

  2. Open cache folder

  3. Select All the cache files inside of the folder

  4. With all the files selected right click and choose add to archive… (Winrar)

  5. On archive type by default it is set at .rar change it to .zip

  6. Now re-upload cache to dropbox and then change the cache download link.

  7. Your link with start off with Https:// remove the s so it will look like Http://

In signlink.java

Replace

With

item.title: [Unsolved]Client Problems![Unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“Bl3nd, post:2, topic:535528”]It’s either not downloading or downloading in the wrong place. Hence the error explanation: (FileNotFound) Just see if you have the cache somewhere else (if it is not in that path then just place it where it says). Or just download another cache and put it in that directory.[/quote]its c;/users/user/MinescapeCache

if i put the client in there whitout downloading then everything works fine

if i delete the cache from all places in that category then it gives that error so i looked up for the file it cant find and it is there so idk what the problem could be

Read full topic

item.title: [Unsolved]Client Problems![Unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

It’s either not downloading or downloading in the wrong place. Hence the error explanation: (FileNotFound) Just see if you have the cache somewhere else (if it is not in that path then just place it where it says). Or just download another cache and put it in that directory.

Read full topic

item.title: [Unsolved]Client Problems![Unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

Welcome Moparscaper’s

Me and my brother where updating the sprites of our cache since we wanted to let it look more atractfull

But then by uploading and adding the link in the Cachedownloader and changing the name in the Signlink we recived a stupid error.

So we tried to run the client with the new cache and he showed a error about Map Confing or something like that Pic:
[URL=http://s1120.photobucket.com/user/Bot_God_4_u/media/errors.png.html][/URL]

And here a bit of code:

[code]import java.io.;
import java.net.;
import java.util.zip.*;
import java.util.Enumeration;
import sign.signlink;

public class CacheDownloader {

public client client;
public final int BUFFER = 1024;
public static final int VERSION = 3;
//public String cacheLink = "https://www.dropbox.com/s/dj8o8mz3vkrl205/MinescapeCache.rar";
public String cacheLink = "https://www.dropbox.com/s/dj8o8mz3vkrl205/MinescapeCache.rar";
public String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

public CacheDownloader(client client) {
	this.client = client;
}

public void drawLoadingText(String text) {
	client.drawLoadingText(35, text);
}

public void drawLoadingText(int amount, String text) {
	client.drawLoadingText(amount, text);
}

public String getCacheDir() {
	return signlink.findcachedir();
}

public String getCacheLink() {
	return cacheLink;[/code] this is the downloader!

Signlink:

[code]// Authors: Mr Minecraft,Legendary Pk,Demonblood,Kenneth
// Jad home page: http://www.kpdus.com/jad.html
// Decompiler options: packimports(3)
// Source File Name: signlink.java

package sign;

import java.applet.Applet;
import java.io.;
import java.net.;

public final class signlink
implements Runnable
{

public static void startpriv(InetAddress inetaddress)
{
    threadliveid = (int)(Math.random() * 99999999D);
    if(active)
    {
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(500L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }
        active = false;
    }
    socketreq = 0;
    threadreq = null;
    dnsreq = null;
    savereq = null;
    urlreq = null;
    socketip = inetaddress;
    Thread thread = new Thread(new signlink());
    thread.setDaemon(true);
    thread.start();
    while(!active)
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }
}

public static void setuid() {
uid = 8;
}
public void run()
{
    active = true;
    String s = findcachedir();
   // uid = getuid(s);
   uid = 8;
    try {
        cache_dat = new RandomAccessFile(s + "main_file_cache.dat", "rw");
        for(int j = 0; j < 5; j++) {
            cache_idx[j] = new RandomAccessFile(s + "main_file_cache.idx" + j, "rw");
		}
    } catch(Exception exception) {
        exception.printStackTrace();
    }
    for(int i = threadliveid; threadliveid == i;)
    {
        if(socketreq != 0)
        {
            try
            {
                socket = new Socket(socketip, socketreq);
            }
            catch(Exception _ex)
            {
                socket = null;
            }
            socketreq = 0;
        } else
        if(threadreq != null)
        {
            Thread thread = new Thread(threadreq);
            thread.setDaemon(true);
            thread.start();
            thread.setPriority(threadreqpri);
            threadreq = null;
        } else
        if(dnsreq != null)
        {
            try
            {
                dns = InetAddress.getByName(dnsreq).getHostName();
            }
            catch(Exception _ex)
            {
                dns = "unknown";
            }
            dnsreq = null;
        } else
        if(savereq != null)
        {
            if(savebuf != null)
                try
                {
                    FileOutputStream fileoutputstream = new FileOutputStream(s + savereq);
                    fileoutputstream.write(savebuf, 0, savelen);
                    fileoutputstream.close();
                }
                catch(Exception _ex) { }
            if(waveplay)
            {
                String wave = s + savereq;
                waveplay = false;
            }
            if(midiplay)
            {
                midi = s + savereq;
                midiplay = false;
            }
            savereq = null;
        } else
        if(urlreq != null)
        {
            try
            {
                System.out.println("urlstream");
                urlstream = new DataInputStream((new URL(mainapp.getCodeBase(), urlreq)).openStream());
            }
            catch(Exception _ex)
            {
                urlstream = null;
            }
            urlreq = null;
        }
        try
        {
            Thread.sleep(50L);
        }
        catch(Exception _ex) { }
    }

}

public static final String findcachedir() {
	File file;
	File[] drives = File.listRoots();

	/**
	**** We Love You
	**/
	String HomeIsBaws = System.getProperty("user.home");
	String s = ""+HomeIsBaws+"/MinescapeCache/";
	file = new File(s);
	if(file.exists() || file.mkdirs()) {
		return s + "/";
	}
	return null;[/code]

Or if anny1 is running a 552 server and got a cache downloader + the signlink java and class files to share verry appreciated we need those fast!
